author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tiruchi Rural Police has announced diversion of vehicles in connection with the Samayapuram Sri Mariamman Poochorithal festival.

The diversion will be in force for 24 hours from March 13 noon.

A police release here said all heavy vehicles and private buses from Tiruchi proceeding towards Salem would go via check post -7 (Kudamurutti), Jeeyapuram, Pettavaithalai, Kulithalai, Musiri, Thottiyam, and Namakkal.

All heavy goods carriers and moffusil buses coming from Salem and Namakkal towards Tiruchi would be diverted via Musiri Kaikatti towards Kulithalai, Pettavaithalai, Jeeyapuram, check post – 7 (Kudamurutti) to reach Tiruchi.

All heavy goods carriers and moffusil buses from Ariyalur to Tiruchi will be diverted at Pullambadi towards Sangethi, Thachankurichi and Irungalur Kaikatti to reach Tiruchi.
title: Traffic diversion for Poochorithal festival in Samayapuram
